subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Heather Mitts hit a post with her seventh-round shot, and Sweden defeated the United States, 4-3, on penalty kicks after a 1-1 tie in the final of the Algarve Cup women’s tournament in Faro, Portugal. Sweden went ahead on a goal by Lotta Schelin in the 19th minute. But the United States rallied when Shannon Boxx tapped in the equalizer at the back post in the 90th minute. algarve.
